items.title: What hurdles does Europe's peace plan for Ukraine face?
items.description: Whatever words are used to frame the plan, enormous challenges lie ahead, the BBC's Frank Gardner writes.

items.title: US tariffs on Canada and Mexico will go ahead on Tuesday, says commerce chief
items.description: Howard Lutnick says the president's threat of blanket import taxes on his neighbours will proceed as planned.

items.title: Gaza ceasefire in peril as Israel and Hamas hit impasse
items.description: Concern grows after Israel said it would block aid to Gaza unless Hamas accepted a new US proposal.

items.title: Blatter and Platini back in court in Swiss Fifa fraud case
items.description: Ex-Fifa head Sepp Blatter and French football great Michel Platini were cleared in 2022, but prosecutors appealed.

items.title: Nigerian Muslims arrested for eating in public during Ramadan
items.description: A total of 25 people are arrested for either not fasting or selling food during the fasting month.
